title: Update the 'Create a Livetile' page
body: Since Windows 8.1 it is possible to create a livetile for a website: http://www.buildmypinnedsite.com/en

comments.body: The procedure described here: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/previous-versions/windows/internet-explorer/ie-developer/samples/dn455106(v=vs.85) has stopped working long ago. I've tried all kinds of things to get it working again but aparently support has been dropped. At first I thought I was the only one but aparently not (see my question on SA: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/32291040/why-have-live-tiles-stopped-working-for-my-website).
